project_description: A Flutter project using the Stacked architecture, featuring routing, dependency injection, and dialog/bottom sheet management. The app provides an onboarding flow for a luxury chauffeur service called Gyde.
architecture_overview: The application follows the Stacked architecture with separate folders for app setup, features, UI components, and utilities. It uses Stacked for state management, routing, and dependency injection. The app includes an onboarding flow with multiple pages and sliding transitions.

files.name: lib/app/app.dart
files.description: Defines the app structure using StackedApp annotation for routes, dependencies, bottom sheets, and dialogs. It includes routes for the onboarding flow and services (BottomSheetService, DialogService, NavigationService).

files.name: lib/features/app/app_view.dart
files.description: Defines the root widget of the application

files.name: lib/features/onboarding/welcome_view.dart
files.description: The welcome page of the onboarding flow with 'Get Started' and introductory text.

files.name: lib/features/onboarding/auth_options_view.dart
files.description: The authentication options page with 'Continue with Phone' and 'Continue with Email'.

files.name: lib/features/onboarding/phone_input_view.dart
files.description: The phone number input page for entering and verifying the phone number.

files.name: lib/features/onboarding/verification_code_view.dart
files.description: The verification code page for entering the received code.

files.name: lib/features/onboarding/email_collection_view.dart
files.description: The email collection page for gathering user emails.

files.name: lib/features/onboarding/welcome_confirmation_view.dart
files.description: The welcome confirmation page with access confirmation text.

files.name: lib/features/onboarding/terms_conditions_view.dart
files.description: The terms and conditions page with agreement text.

files.name: lib/main.dart
files.description: The entry point of the application. Sets up the app and runs it.

methods.name: main
methods.description: The main function that runs the app

dependencies.name: stacked
dependencies.purpose: Stacked architecture for state management and routing

sequence_diagram:
@startuml
actor User
participant main
participant AppView
participant WelcomeView
participant AuthOptionsView
participant PhoneInputView
participant VerificationCodeView
participant EmailCollectionView
participant WelcomeConfirmationView
participant TermsConditionsView

User -> main: Launch app
main -> AppView: Create and run
AppView -> WelcomeView: Show welcome page
WelcomeView -> AuthOptionsView: Navigate on 'Get Started'
AuthOptionsView -> PhoneInputView: Navigate on 'Continue with Phone'
PhoneInputView -> VerificationCodeView: Navigate on phone number input
VerificationCodeView -> EmailCollectionView: Navigate on code entry
EmailCollectionView -> WelcomeConfirmationView: Navigate on email input
WelcomeConfirmationView -> TermsConditionsView: Navigate on confirmation
User -> TermsConditionsView: Agree to terms
@enduml
state_management_flow: State is managed using the Stacked architecture. ViewModels handle the business logic and state for their respective views. The app.locator.dart file sets up dependency injection, while app.router.dart manages navigation between views.
navigation_flow: The application starts with main.dart, which sets up the app and runs AppView. AppView initializes the Stacked architecture and shows the WelcomeView. The onboarding flow progresses through multiple pages with sliding transitions, managed by the Stacked Router defined in app.router.dart.
